page.title: 06Shelve Pool.
page.content: The pool is a very pleasant spot and a great favourite with the locals, possibly because it is so out of the way and not the easiest place to find. on the summers day we visited it, we found hundreds of tiny{frogs}and there were many{ dragonflies.}The water {gives}the appearance of silver possibly because it surrounded by trees oak and willow. On the western shore there grew a large patch of {reedmace and bullrushes.}It is obviously not a place frequented by tourists or the casual visitor because you cannot get near it by car and it does have{desolate}feel about it with an air of{mystery...}the children were very excited by the place.
